name: Monue
description:
You have fallen in between the cracks in the world. You find yourself in Monue, a void-like space covered in haze and pierced by peal-colored pillars. Luckily for you, the space's inhabitants have taken pity on you and They now seek to help you return from whence you came.  They are your only hope of escape. Find the gates and find your way out!

Game by: koshasalt

Music by: @mavoproject

(This game was created as a part of the 72-hour VR Jan Jam 2022.)
